column1: Among   other   things,   the   Respondents   filed   their   objections   and   the   5th  Respondent   in   his
objections has taken the following preliminary objections to this application.

column2: The Petitioners have failed to describe the public duty the Respondents have failed or
refused to discharge and have failed to specify the relevant law.
The Petitioners have misquoted relevant sections of the law on which he relies.
Petitioners have not named the necessary parties thus the application is misconceived
